HelpEntry.Text: The name or "Title" of the Quest.
A story about the quest, as in why the player should do it.
An explanation of what the user needs to do to complete the quest.
The text shown by the NPC when talking to them while on the quest.
Text shown by the NPC when handing in the Quest for completion.
What Faction Group the player must be a part of to get this Quest.
The recommended level for this quest. Display purposes only.
The name of the Quest Chain this Quest is a part of.
Can the quest be done more than once.
Up to 3 items can be given to players upon starting a quest.
A quest that must be completed before the player will be offered this quest.
A quest that must have been started before the player will be offered this quest. A quest that is completed also meets this requirement.
What level the player must be before they are offered the quest.
What race the player needs to be to get this quest.
What class the player must be to get this quest.
What skill the player must have to start the quest.
What level the players skill needs to be to start the quest.
Choose a faction the player needs to have a certain stance with to be offered this quest.
What stance the player needs to have to start this quest. Any stance greater than the one specified will count.
Click this button to set another objective for the Quest.
The type of objective. item is used for Item Collection objectives and mob is used for Kill objectives where the player must kill the specified mob.
The Item or Mob this objective requires the player to collect or kill.
How many of the item or mob the player needs to collect or kill.
Write out the objective here that will be displayed in the players quest log.
The amount of experience points the player is awarded for completing the quest.
An item the player is given upon completing the quest.
How many of the item is given.
The player can choose one of the listed choice items upon completing the quest.
What faction the players reputation will change with for completing the quest.
The amount the players reputation changes by.
